table.name: animal_union_batch_id_view
table.viewSql: SELECT animal_union_batch_id_view.id, animal_union_batch_id_view.farm_id, animal_union_batch_id_view.batch, animal_union_batch_id_view.created_at, (row_number() OVER (PARTITION BY animal_union_batch_id_view.farm_id ORDER BY animal_union_batch_id_view.created_at, animal_union_batch_id_view.id, animal_union_batch_id_view.batch))::integer AS internal_identifier FROM ( SELECT a.id, a.farm_id, false AS batch, a.created_at FROM animal a UNION ALL SELECT ab.id, ab.farm_id, true AS batch, ab.created_at FROM animal_batch ab) animal_union_batch_id_view ORDER BY animal_union_batch_id_view.created_at, animal_union_batch_id_view.id, animal_union_batch_id_view.batch;
